Name: Moon Scarf
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cleffa, Clefairy, and Clefable.  You can get a Moon Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Clef-Claw, a Clef-Fang, and a Moon Jewel. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
